* run.py (bed_filename, bedgraph_filename): fix num_worlds == 0 error
(make_gmtk_kwargs): change comment

(queue_identify): formatting

* output.py: (OutputSaver) new class, replaces make_filename(),
adjusted callers

* common.py: fix MSG_EDGE English
